name: portfolio-builder
description: Full-stack portfolio builder with resume parsing capabilities

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:backend && npm run test:coverage:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:ci: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:backend: cd portfolio-backend && rm -rf node_modules dist coverage
scripts.clean:frontend: cd portfolio-frontend && rm -rf node_modules build coverage
scripts.audit: npm run audit:backend && npm run audit:frontend
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Portfolio Builder setup complete! Run npm run dev to start development.'
